body: C. Custer from ChinaGeek publishes an opinion post, "Criticism needed in a rising China", written by Eric Fish. The article, commenting on Global Times' earlier editorial "China will endure more criticism", was rejected by their editors.
original_body: C. Custer from ChinaGeek publishes an opinion post, "Criticism needed in a rising China", written by Eric Fish. The article, commenting on Global Times' earlier editorial "China will endure more criticism", was rejected by their editors.
title: Criticism needed in a rising China
